name: New Scale Technologies
overview: New Scale Technologies, Inc. creates motion systems integrating motor and sensor technology with supporting electronics. It offers small motion systems, micro motors, encoders, and micro-actuator modules that enable design engineers to create small products, including mobile phone cameras, electronic locks, and intelligent fasteners; nano-scale fluid control, such as lab-on-a-chip systems; medical devices, which include miniature drug pumps and endoscopes, optics, cryogenic and MRI-compatible instruments, and imaging systems; automotive modules, lasers, and aerospace and defense systems; consumer electronics comprising micro fuel cells; and industrial and research applications. The companyâ€™s products include SQUIGGLE motor, a linear motor and ASIC driver; TRACKER position sensor, a magnetic sensor array and resolution miniature encoder; closed-loop miniature motion systems with driver, motors, and sensors; closed-loop micro-actuator modules for lock assemblies and other applications; and custom product development, such as rotary motor and ultra small actuator systems. New Scale Technologies, Inc. has strategic partnerships with austriamicrosystems, ALPS and Tamron, and EPCOS AG. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Victor, New York with operations in the United States, Europe, and Asia.
